rooms.Name: The hills
rooms.Description:
The hills continue as far as you can see. Exits are south and east. To the
east, a high, snowy mountain rises up out of the gloom.

Exits.Description: The hills continue west. You can see the path leading towards Moria that way.

rooms.Name: The hills
rooms.Description:
The hills stretch as far as you can see here. Exits are north, south, and
east. Far to the east, you see a tall, snowy mountain.

rooms.Name: The hills
rooms.Description:
The hills extend almost to the limits of your vision here, in all four
cardinal directions. To the west, you can see the Lane leading toward the
mountain-mines of Moria; far to the east, a huge snowy mountain rises out
of the hilly country. The the north and south, more hills.

rooms.Name: The hills
rooms.Description:
The hills stretch as far as you can see here. Exits are north, south, and
east. Far to the east, you see a tall, snowy mountain.

rooms.Name: The hills
rooms.Description:
The hills extend as far as you can see from here. Exits are north and east.
Far to the east, you can make out a high, snowy mountain.

rooms.Name: The hills
rooms.Description:
The hills suddenly shear away into a wide, deep gorge to the east. There is no
safe way to descend from here; you must go south or west instead. You can
still see the mountain, off to the east, beyond the gorge.

rooms.Name: The hills
rooms.Description:
The hills suddenly shear off into a wide, deep gorge to the east. There is
no safe way to descend from here; however, you can still go north, south,
or west. The mountain to the east looks closer, but you must cross the gorge
in order to ascend its slopes.

rooms.Name: The hills
rooms.Description:
The hills suddenly break off into a deep, wide gorge to the east. There is
no safe way for you to descend from here; you will have to continue north,
south, or west. To the east, the mountain still lurks beyond the gorge,
taunting you with its inaccessibility.

rooms.Name: The hills
rooms.Description:
The hills continue in each cardinal direction except for east, where a
gaping gorge blocks your passage. You seem to see a slope that will take
you safely into its depths further to the south. The snowy mountain still
stands tall and serene before you, far to the east.

rooms.Name: The hills
rooms.Description:
The hills still spread out before you as far as you can see, except for to
the east, where a deep gorge slashes the foothills, blocking your passage.
There is a pass down into the gorge here that, although steep, still looks
safe enough for you to traverse. To the east, the mountain still rises
high above you.

rooms.Name: The gorge
rooms.Description:
You are standing at the bottom of the gorge, looking up at a steep but
serviceable pass that leads up the east side. There is no way to climb the
west side, but the gorge continues to the south, so maybe you can find a
different route in that direction.

rooms.Name: The gorge
rooms.Description:
This gorge is definitely getting hazardous to your health. The caves which
you noticed earlier have sprouted huge, ugly heads, and boulders the size
of your chest are hurtling down around you. You think you can make out a
pass leading up the east side of the gorge to the north. Better run!

rooms.Name: The gorge
rooms.Description:
The high stone walls of the gorge block all passage except to the north or
south. You see caves in the walls of the cliffs, but they are too high up
for you to reach. As you ponder your next move, a large rock hurtles down
from the cliff, just missing your head!

rooms.Name: The gorge
rooms.Description:
The gorge continues to the north and south. To the south you see a steep
pass leading up the west side of the gorge. Caves dot the cliff walls here,
and the smell of rotting meat permeates the area.

rooms.Name: The gorge
rooms.Description:
You have descended into the deep gorge. The walls rise high around you, and
you notice a number of caves dotting the walls, perhaps ten feet off the
ground. You smell rotting meat. There is no way to climb the other side of
the gorge, but it continues to the north, or you can ascend the near side.

rooms.Name: The hills
rooms.Description:
You are standing on the east side of a deep, wide gorge. On the other side,
rolling hills lead back to the Lane. Before you, hills continue to the foot
of a tall, snowy mountain. You can go down into the gorge, or south.

rooms.Name: The hills
rooms.Description:
You are standing on a hilltop, right next to a huge mountain, so tall you
feel a twinge in your neck trying to see the top. There is a huge boulder
to the south, possibly blocking an entrance. To the west is a deep gorge,
but there is no safe way to descend from here. To the north, more hills.

rooms.Name: The hills
rooms.Description:
You are standing before a very large boulder which has been crammed up against
the side of the mountain to the east. You feel a light breeze blowing, and
see a dim light behind the large rock. It is much too heavy to move with bare
hands, however. To the west, a gaping gorge stands ready to send you falling
to your death. To the north and south, more hills.

Exits.Description:
A huge boulder blocks the entrance to the mountain.
Looks like you'll need a lever of some sort to move it.

rooms.Name: The hills
rooms.Description:
You are strolling along the rolling hills, just in front of the huge snowy
mountain. The rock wall is directly to the east, but you see a large boulder
standing against the mountain a bit to the north. To the south, the hills
continue, and to the west, a treacherous gorge blocks your passage.

rooms.Name: The hills
rooms.Description:
You have come to a dead end; smooth, solid rock walls block passage to the
east and south, and a wide and dangerous gorge spreads out to the south.
Your only exit is north, to more rolling hills.

rooms.Name: Inside the cave
rooms.Description:
You are inside the giant cave. It looks pretty boring over here, so you would
probably be best off going somewhere else. Exits are east, further into the
cave, or south, back to the huge boulder-door.

rooms.Name: Inside the cave
rooms.Description:
This cave is a lot darker than you expected...you take a moment for your eyes
to adjust to the gloom. All around you, large stalactites shimmer glassily in
the dim glare of your light source. With a shock you notice that you are not
alone in here! Huge, lanky forms shamble around, glancing occassionally in
your direction, but paying you no mind. You seem to have stumbled into an
enclave of stone giants! The cave continues noth, south, and east, and to
the west, a giant boulder blocks the egress to the cave.

Exits.Description:
A huge boulder blocks the exit to the cave.
Looks like you will need a lever of some sort to move it.

rooms.Name: Inside the cave
rooms.Description:
You are inside the giant cave. This part is stunningly boring, so you would be
best advised to go east, further into the cave, or north, back towards the
giant boulder blocking the exit.

rooms.Name: Inside the cave
rooms.Description:
You are in the northernmost end of the giant cave. The floor is a bit warmer
here than elsewhere in the cave, and the stone giants do not appear very
comfortable hanging around here. The cave continues south and east.

rooms.Name: Inside the cave
rooms.Description:
You are in the north-central portion of the giant cave. You smell fresh,
cold air from the south, and to the north it is dark and silent. The cave
also continues further east from this point.

rooms.Name: Inside the cave
rooms.Description:
You are in the north-central portion of the giant cave, which continues in
all four cardinal directions from here. The boulder blocking the entrance
lies to the southwest from your current position.

rooms.Name: Inside the cave
rooms.Description:
You are in the center of the giant cave. Stone giants move busily around you,
and you are hard-pressed to keep out from underfoot. Best to move before you
are accidentally squashed. The cave continues to the north, south, east, and
west from your current location.

rooms.Name: Inside the cave
rooms.Description:
You are in the south-central part of the giant cave. You hear some alarming
grinding noises coming from the south, but it is too dark to see what's going
on over there. There are exits in all four cardinal directions.

rooms.Name: Inside the cave
rooms.Description:
You are in the southern part of the giant cave. There are grinding noises all
around you, and you see to your amazement that there are some stone giants
here, grinding up rocks with their bare hands! They are ignoring you right
now, and you feel it best to keep it that way. You can go north, south, or
east from here. You feel a breeze from the north.

rooms.Name: Inside the cave
rooms.Description:
You are standing next to the south wall of the giant cave. You see that a 
bunch of crude handholds have been carved into the wall here, allowing you to
climb out of the cave and up the mountainside. A blast of chilly air mixed
with snow washes down on you as you consider it. Your other options are north
and east, further into the cave.

rooms.Name: Inside the cave
rooms.Description:
You are at the far northern end of the giant cave. The floor is quite a bit
warmer here than in the rest of the cave. On the floor, you see a large,
heavy-looking trap door made of iron. It looks quite sturdy. The cave
continues south and west from here.

Exits.Description: A heavy trapdoor made of iron is on the floor. It is warm to the touch.

rooms.Name: Inside the cave
rooms.Description:
You are in the northern portion of the cave. You notice that the floor here
is a bit warmer than elsewhere in the cave, and furthermore, the stone giants
seem to be avoiding this side. Hmmmm... You can go north, south, or west.

rooms.Name: Inside the cave
rooms.Description:
You are in the north-central portion of the giant cave. To the south, you hear
faint grinding noises. To the north, it is dark and silent. You can also go
east or west from here.

rooms.Name: Inside the cave
rooms.Description:
You are in the center of the giant cave. Stone giants move all around you,
completely blase about your presence in their home. It might be a good idea
to leave before they change their minds, however, since they look like they
could easily squash you flat. You can exit in any cardinal direction.

rooms.Name: Inside the cave
rooms.Description:
You are walking around in the south-central portion of the giant cave. You
hear some funny, stone-on-stone scraping noises to the south, but to the
north, all is dark and quiet. There are still plenty of stone giants around,
though, so don't relax yet. Exits lie in all four cardinal directions.

rooms.Name: Inside the cave
rooms.Description:
You are in the southern part of the giant cave. There are a lot of giants here,
so you'd better stay out of the way, or you'll get stomped. You can go north,
south, or west from here.

rooms.Name: Inside the cave
rooms.Description:
You are next to the southern wall of the giant cave. Busy stone giants labor
all around you, and you are careful to keep from underfoot. You can go north
or west from here. To the west, you see sunlight, and feel cold, fresh air.

rooms.Name: Inside the cave
rooms.Description:
You are in the extreme eastern end of the giant cave. A large pile of huge,
heavy boulders has been made here for some inexplicable reason. You can go
south or west from here.

rooms.Name: Inside the cave
rooms.Description:
You are at the extreme eastern end of the giant cave. The floor shakes with
giant's footsteps, and the air resounds with booming voices. You can go
north, south, or west from here.

rooms.Name: Inside the cave
rooms.Description:
You are at the far eastern end of the giant cave. Stalactites loom around you.
It is very dark here, but you hear the shuffling sounds of giant feet moving
all around you. You can go north or west from here.

rooms.Name: On the mountainside
rooms.Description:
The path takes another hairpin turn here, leading down and to the north, or up
and to the east. You feel the bitingly cold wind whoosh around the side of
the mountain, and begin to seriously consider turning back.

rooms.Name: On the mountainside
rooms.Description:
That wind is blowing in your face again, and with it comes some soft, sticky
snowflakes. You'd better hurry if you want to get to the top of this mountain,
as the footing will get very slippery pretty soon. You can continue east or
west from here.

rooms.Name: On the mountainside
rooms.Description:
The snow is beginning to collect. As you turn around, you can already see your
tracks beginning to disappear. You can go east or west from here.

rooms.Name: On the mountainside
rooms.Description:
The path is steadily inclining as you walk along it. It bends here, turning to
the north, or you can go west, back the way you came.

rooms.Name: On the mountainside
rooms.Description:
You are standing on a steep path leading around the outside of the mountain.
The wind howls around you, and you are finding it very difficult to keep your
footing. The path continues to the north, slanting upward, or you can get back
to the safety of the cave, below.

rooms.Name: On the mountainside
rooms.Description:
This portion of the path seems to be out of the wind, so you choose to take
the opportunity to shake some of the snow out of your footwear. You can take
the path south, further up the incline, or north, back the way you came.

rooms.Name: On the mountainside
rooms.Description:
You have reached the end of this particular path, as you come to a sheer cliff
face that prevents further progress to the west. If you are very brave and
very lucky, you could possibly climb the cliff and continue up the mountain,
but it would probably be better just to go east, back the way you came.

rooms.Name: On the mountainside
rooms.Description:
The path is so steep here that you are forced to crawl along it to make any
headway. You can barely feel your hands! The path continues back to the east,
and to the west you see a sheer cliff face.

rooms.Name: On the mountainside
rooms.Description:
The path turns again here, heading west and south. The snow is getting deeper,
and you are feeling VERY cold. It would be quite nice to get off this cliff,
you reflect as you cling to the path, shivering.

rooms.Name: On the mountainside
rooms.Description:
The steep mountain path continues north and south around the mountain here.
It is extremely cold here; you feel your extremities growing numb.

rooms.Name: On the mountainside
rooms.Description:
The path makes a dangerous turn to the south here, but by sliding yourself
along and muttering a prayer or two, you think you'll be able to make it.
Alternatively, you can head back east, where the path heads slightly downward.

rooms.Name: On the mountainside
rooms.Description:
The path is getting steeper and more slippery here; you had better watch your
step! To the west, you see the path making a tight and dangerous turn to the
south, and to the east the going is a bit easier.

rooms.Name: On the mountainside
rooms.Description:
You are wending your weary way around the dangerous mountain path. Your toes
are getting numb as they crunch through the snow and ice. The path continues
east and west from here, and inclines slightly to the west.

rooms.Name: On the mountainside
rooms.Description:
Continuing along the narrow path, a sudden gust of wind almost sends you
hurtling off the cliff. You cling tightly to the wall, and your blood freezes
as you hear the lonely howl of a wolf, close by. You may continue east or west
from here.

rooms.Name: On the mountainside
rooms.Description:
You are at a treacherous bend in the mountain path. You may continue to the
west, where the path winds slowly up the mountain, or south, where there is
a slight decline.

rooms.Name: Further up the mountainside
rooms.Description:
The path curves sharply upward here; you are going to need to crawl in order
to continue up it, to the north. East, back the way you came, is looking more
and more attractive...

rooms.Name: Further up the mountainside
rooms.Description: Wind. Snow. Ice. Rock. Yawn! Exits are east and west.

rooms.Name: Further up the mountainside
rooms.Description:
The path looks very firmly packed down here, as if freshly walked on by
someone or something very big and heavy. Your hand twitches toward your
weapon as you contemplate a fight in this thin, cold air...better, perhaps
to move on, where the path continues to the west or the northeast.

rooms.Name: Further up the mountainside
rooms.Description:
You have (barely!) managed to scramble up the cliff face, and are now looking
at a slightly wider path, continuing around and up the mountain. The path
goes off to the northeast, or you may climb back down the cliff face.

rooms.Name: Further up the mountainside
rooms.Description:
The path is still winding its way up the mountain...you may continue to the
east, or backtrack to the south. Watch out for falling rocks, though.

rooms.Name: Further up the mountainside
rooms.Description:
The path is turning sharply upward again...and the air is getting thinner.
All of your gear feels like it weighs a ton, and your feet drag listlessly
in the snow. When will it end?! You can go east or west from here.

rooms.Name: Further up the mountainside
rooms.Description:
You wearily slow to a stop and contemplate the high, icy wall of a cliff that
rises in front of you. You can dimly see a path continuing up the mountain
on top of the cliff, but you are not sure if your cold-numbed muscles can
stand such a climb. Maybe you'd better head west instead.

rooms.Name: Further up the mountainside
rooms.Description:
Peering into the wind, your watery eyes notice that the path is getting even
wider here, allowing you to relax a bit without fear of plummeting to a cold
and painful death. The path continues to the northwest and southwest.

rooms.Name: Further up the mountainside
rooms.Description:
The mountain path leads east and southwest from here, and inclines slightly
as you head east. The wind howls around you, making it hard to keep your
footing on the tightly packed snow and ice of the path.

rooms.Name: Further up the mountainside
rooms.Description:
"Because it's there," does not seem to be sufficient reason to attempt this
climb, you reflect as a strong gust of wind nearly hurls you off the side of
the mountain. You can continue east or west from here.

rooms.Name: Further up the mountainside
rooms.Description:
You have come to an easier portion of the climb, the path gets quite a bit
wider here anyway. You are able to take your numbed hands off the cliff wall
for a moment and try to pound some life into them. The path continues to the
west and southeast.

rooms.Name: Near the top of the mountain
rooms.Description:
You clutch the side of the mountain as a fresh gust of wind howls
dramatically around you. The mountain path continues upward to the northwest,
and declines toward the north. You are nearly at the top now.

rooms.Name: Near the top of the mountain
rooms.Description:
The path is almost invisible under the thick carpet of snow. Your feet sink
in almost up to your thighs, and your gear is getting heavier with each step.
The path continues to the northeast and southwest, and you can almost see the
peack of the mountain from here...

rooms.Name: Near the top of the mountain
rooms.Description:
You struggle your way to the top of the cliff and pause to catch your breath.
It is getting more and more difficult to do so, as the air is very cold and
thin up here. However, you have almost reached the top of the mountain...just
a few more feet to go. You may proceed south or down from here.

rooms.Name: Near the top of the mountain
rooms.Description:
GROAN...not again!! This high cliff face looks almost impassable, especially
in your half-frozen and bedraggled condition. However, if you manage to make
it up there, you will be at the mountain's peak at last! However, the faint
of heart can still go northwest and avoid the whole issue.

rooms.Name: Near the top of the mountain
rooms.Description:
Almost...there...! The path goes only a little further now, sloping upward to
the southeast, but you catch sight of yet another high cliff face and groan
in utter despair. You look longingly back to the southwest...

rooms.Name: The mountain peak
rooms.Description:
You have made it to the top of the mountain! Yay for you! However, you have
little time to enjoy your triumph, as Jakan Djanneskald, the mighty frost
giant, has made it up here before you, and is perparing to send you back
down the mountain...the quick way!

rooms.Name: An underground cavern
rooms.Description:
You are standing on the southern portion of the big platform of lava-rock.
The room is well-lit by the enormous flow of red-hot lava directly under you,
and you shiver at the thought of how quickly you would be consumed, should
you be so foolish as to enter it. The only safe direction to go is north.

Exits.Description: No, you DON'T want to go this way...

rooms.Name: A pit of boiling lava
rooms.Description:
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRGGGGGGGGGGGGGGHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!

                             You are VERY dead.

rooms.Name: A pit of boiling lava
rooms.Description:
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRGGGGGGGGGGGGGGHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!

                             You are VERY dead.

rooms.Name: A pit of boiling lava
rooms.Description:
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRGGGGGGGGGGGGGGHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!

                             You are VERY dead.

rooms.Name: An underground cavern
rooms.Description:
These must be the homes of fire giants. They are incredibly large, but crudely
fashioned of black igneous rock. You try to make yourself as inconspicuous as
possibly to avoid getting killed and eaten. North is your only safe exit.

Exits.Description: Instant death awaits you to the east.
Um, I wouldn't recommend it...

rooms.Name: A pit of boiling lava
rooms.Description:
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRGGGGGGGGGGGGGGHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!

                             You are VERY dead.

rooms.Name: A pit of boiling lava
rooms.Description:
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRGGGGGGGGGGGGGGHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!

                             You are VERY dead.

rooms.Name: A pit of boiling lava
rooms.Description:
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRGGGGGGGGGGGGGGHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!

                             You are VERY dead.

rooms.Name: An underground cavern
rooms.Description:
You are at the southern end of the fire giants' courtyard. The fire giants
appear extremely wary, as if they expect to be attacked soon. But maybe
that is just how they always are. North is your only safe exit, as boiling
hot lava seethes to the west.

Exits.Description: Don't say I didn't warn you...

rooms.Name: An underground cavern
rooms.Description:
You have descended a ladder made of heavy black metal, and are now standing
in a cavern deep underneath the mountain. The temperature here is markedly
warmer than elsewhere in the caves, and you begin to perspire furiously.
You are standing on a large platform made of lava-rock, which extends to the
north, south, and east, or you may ascend the ladder to get back to the cave.

Exits.Description: A ladder leads back up to the stone giant cave.

rooms.Name: A treacherous rock bridge
rooms.Description:
You are on a wide but very narrow bridge made from solid lava-rock. Boiling
hot lava cascades like water underneath you, so you are careful to stay to
the center of the bridge. The heat is almost unbearable. The only safe ways
to proceed are east and west.

Exits.Description: Um, no, not a good idea.
Don't be stupid. You want to swim in red-hot lava?

rooms.Name: A treacherous rock bridge
rooms.Description:
Continuing across the rock bridge, you notice some very large shapes striding
along, calling out in deep, booming voices. What sort of creatures could take
this much heat? The only safe ways to proceed are east and west.

Exits.Description: You have a death wish or something?
I said, RED HOT LAVA. Get it?

rooms.Name: A treacherous rock bridge
rooms.Description:
You are almost halfway across the rock bridge, and the heat is, if anything,
only getting worse. The shapes appear to be humanoid in form, but MUCH bigger
than any humanoids you have ever seen. East and west are the only safe ways
to proceed from here.

Exits.Description: Does the word "doom" mean anything to you?
Why don't you just fall on your sword instead?

rooms.Name: An underground cavern
rooms.Description:
The rock bridge has intersected an underground cavern here, and as you look
around, you see that the cavern is filled with enormous dwelling places, all
made out of unattractive black lava-rock. You feel a sudden chill despite the
heat as you realize that these must be the homes of the evil fire giants! You
may continue in all four cardinal directions from here.

rooms.Name: A treacherous rock bridge
rooms.Description:
You are continuing up the second portion of the rock bridge. Up ahead, you see
a large, blocky stone structure shaped vaguely like a castle. Fire giants are
prowling around it, as if looking for intruders. Maybe you should leave before
they discover you...

Exits.Description: No, I don't think so...
Just don't. Trust me on this one.

rooms.Name: A treacherous rock bridge
rooms.Description:
The rock bridge continues east and west, while north and south, lava flows,
promising an instant but very painful death. The large stone structure is
getting closer now, to the east, and the fire giant dwellings are west.

Exits.Description: Death awaits you to the north.
Go ahead, I DARE you...

rooms.Name: A treacherous rock bridge
rooms.Description:
You are almost at the end of the rock bridge. Directly to the east is the
"courtyard" of the fire giant "castle", while to the west you can still dimly
see the dwelling places of the other fire giants. There are a number of very
large, very mean-looking fire giants prowling around, so you had best be very
careful. North and south, lava flows.

Exits.Description: It's called a death trap. Ever heard of them?
Well, if you MUST learn the hard way...

rooms.Name: An underground cavern
rooms.Description:
You are in the courtyard of the fire giant castle. Huge and terrible figures
move around near you. In the interior of the castle, to the east, you can see
an extremely large and well-armed fire giant molesting a mighty storm giant,
who appears to be shackled into a sitting position. Other fire giants are
crowding around to see the fun. North and south, the courtyard continues,
and to the west is the treacherous rock bridge.

rooms.Name: Hall of the Fire Giant King
rooms.Description:
This room is decked out in barbaric splendor, with all sorts of metallic
treasure strewn about. In the center of the floor, a mighty storm giant sits
shackled to the floor, where he is being tormented by a number of very large
fire giants. His huge eyes catch yours, and you are filled with sympathy for
this being, who has been brought so low by such evil creatures. Perhaps you
would be able to free him from his bondage...

rooms.Name: An underground cavern
rooms.Description:
You are standing on the northern portion of the platform of lava-rock. It is
extraordinarily hot here, especially because of the tremendous flow of hot
lava directly to the east. One false move, and you would be instantly crisped.
The only safe direction to go from here is south.

Exits.Description: The hot lava boils furiously under you. You DON'T want to go this way!

rooms.Name: A pit of boiling lava
rooms.Description:
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRGGGGGGGGGGGGGGHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!

                             You are VERY dead.

                             You are VERY dead.

AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRGGGGGGGGGGGGGGHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!

                             You are VERY dead.

rooms.Name: An underground cavern
rooms.Description:
Moving cautiously around the cavern, you gaze in fascination at the homes of
the fire giants. They are incredibly large, yet crudely made. Fire giants are
reportedly much stronger than they are smart, but when you are strong ENOUGH,
being smart ceases to be quite as important. You'd better hope they don't see
you lurking around, or you will be in big trouble. South is your only safe exit.

Exits.Description: Plunging into hot lava is not an Olympic sport yet. Forget it.
That's right, COOK the giants' food for them...go ahead.

                             You are VERY dead.

rooms.Name: An underground cavern
rooms.Description:
You are at the northern end of the courtyard. Fire giants are patrolling
the area, looking for intruders. The look in their eyes teels you that they
are not interested in taking you on a tour of their domain. South is the
only safe exit; hot lava flows fiercely to the west.

Exits.Description: You will DIE, you fool, DIE!
